pullRequest.body:
Defines left/right lifting property wrt a `MorphismProperty` and shows basic closure properties (retracts, pullback/pushout, composition etc.).

```suggestion
namespace Retract

instance : IsSplitMono h.i := ⟨⟨h.splitMono⟩⟩
```
